segments.text: Did you hear about Joe ? She hasn't eaten for days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Love sick . You know who she's in love with ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't have the slightest idea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? Not my Dad , I hope ! ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on , Mary , it's your brother , Jack .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No kidding ! Jack is such a log ! He's never dated a girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The problem with Joe is that she's too shy to tell him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the problem with Jack is that he seems to have no interest in girls . He's putting his heart into his stamp collection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you want to help your friend , you should do something about it .
segments.speaker: S1
